title: Tadej Poga훾ar Blows the Doors off with Third-Straight Win at Il Lombardia
content:
Poga훾ar goes solo 30km from the final to end his season with a wild array of victories including at Lombardia, Flanders, Paris-Nice.

Read the full article at Tadej Poga훾ar Blows the Doors off with Third-Straight Win at Il Lombardia on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
